channel.title: Call of Duty: Black Ops
channel.description:
Thoughts?
I really like it, more realistic game-play however it makes it a lot harder to play!! Zombies is very difficult and is quite dark, I got to level 9 in zombies so far.
Haven't played single player yet but will update this post tomorrow when I have time to play, back to revising I go :p

item.title: Call of Duty: Black Ops
item.dc:creator: @Erj Erj
item.description:
@Erj wrote:

TabbyKiller:

I hate it tbh, although some of the features are still pretty good like making your own emblems. But I’m strictly a sniper and it sucks to snipe in BO

Quick Scoping is possible now, I saw some good players with the L96AW QScoping the shit outta me.
The only gun I use now is the Ak-47 with Suppressor and play Search and Destroy and a bit of Capture the Flag on my PS3

item.title: Call of Duty: Black Ops
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

I’m on Black-Ops because of the zombies, however, the problems are sometimes within the server alone, or because someone has horrible connection. Sometimes when one of our friend’s or even me alone will attempt to join another game, it lags like Hell and doesn’t allow us to join each other’s game. And also along with the problem of kicking people out before starting the game, it takes me like four or five times before I can find a legit game.

Multiplayer doesn’t surprise me at all, I wasn’t impressed at all. HOWEVER, the Wager Matches are quite interesting, and impressive. I didn’t think the owner’s would come up with something like that. There were a lot of patches in the game that I was proud of. Though, the Multi doesn’t impress me to the extent of me jumping out the window because I’m excited.

Read full topic

item.title: Call of Duty: Black Ops
item.dc:creator: @eczema3 eczema3
item.description:
@eczema3 wrote:

[quote=“R.I.P RSC, post:141, topic:367123”]Games are pretty much following the mainstream movies. It’s all about graphics and fast gameplay. I don’t care too much about graphics in games, as long as you don’t get lost in tons of sub-menu’s. CS is about skill, everyone has access to all the weapons. CoD is about playing it as long as you can.

You guys think the CoD engine is updated at all? Or did they just slab on some other textures and cashed in again.[/quote]
MW2 ran much better than CoD4 ever did, so I guess they must do.

Read full topic

item.title: Call of Duty: Black Ops
item.dc:creator: @Cbot Cbot
item.description:
@Cbot wrote:

Niall:

[quote author=Cbot link=topic=463313.msg3448235#msg3448235 date=1293569232]Game wise I can confidently say this is the most balanced COD game I’ve played so far.

Pfft. Snipers, shotguns and lmgs are all useless compared to smgs or assault rifles and even then you ONLY need the ak74u and einfield for any situation, knifing is more broken than the mp40 being a 2 hit kill weapon on console without stopping power, the maps are somewhat nice but too small and spawning is broken(on every map not just nuketown), attachments are completely fucked, helicopters avoid locked on rockets far too fucking often(given the 5 fucking second reload time) and speaking of helicopters the killstreaks are op.[/quote]
Not going to lie, I don’t agree with you on the sniper rifle. I’ve used snipers and have gotten great scores with them, especially since the recent patches.

As far as LMGs and Shotguns go, I believe that they just need a buff. Not a game changing buff but just added strength. Also, as far as the AK74u goes it isn’t overpowered just overused. Maybe if the other SMGs got a small buff they would be used more often.

But I can’t tell you how many times I’ve gotten beat out by LMGs in long range and shotguns in short range while using an assault rifle or the AK74U.

I don’t know much about PC gaming, considering my machine is a POS with a processor, so I don’t know how things change in the PC gaming environment for BO.

Also, sorry if you got the impression that I meant this was the most balanced FPS I’ve played. I said it before, I meant the most balanced out of the COD series.

Read full topic

item.title: Call of Duty: Black Ops
item.dc:creator: @nohope nohope
item.description:
@nohope wrote:

Niall:

[quote author=Cbot link=topic=463313.msg3448235#msg3448235 date=1293569232]Game wise I can confidently say this is the most balanced COD game I’ve played so far.

Pfft. Snipers, shotguns and lmgs are all useless compared to smgs or assault rifles and even then you ONLY need the ak74u and einfield for any situation, knifing is more broken than the mp40 being a 2 hit kill weapon on console without stopping power, the maps are somewhat nice but too small and spawning is broken(on every map not just nuketown), attachments are completely fucked, helicopters avoid locked on rockets far too fucking often(given the 5 fucking second reload time) and speaking of helicopters the killstreaks are op.

Even crysis with the cheapest tank being most overpowered was more balanced than black ops.

The only thing I like about black ops is zombies and the only thing going for the game is for a casual console fps it’s definitely not the worse.[/quote]
I agree with you the only thing this game is for for is nazi zombies, although I’m starting to hate that too. Two nights ago me and 3 friends played Kino der toten. About a hour in one of them left because he had to go to work. Then for the next four hours me and my 2 other friends got to level 34. After the game we realized it wasn’t on the leaderboards. Five fucking hours wasted. And yesterday I was playing zombies with some randoms, and suprisingly enough they all had headphones, and they were decent. About an hour and a half in we were on level 22 and we were doing fine when suddenly it just exited us out of the game, not even lagging but just completely disconnected us. Here is a picture of what it said when I was disconnected.

Another thing that I hate about nazi zombies is you can’t find a good tea 95% of the time. Either they don’t have mics, they are 10 years old, or they suck.

Read full topic

item.title: Call of Duty: Black Ops
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

Cbot:

Game wise I can confidently say this is the most balanced COD game I’ve played so far.

Pfft. Snipers, shotguns and lmgs are all useless compared to smgs or assault rifles and even then you ONLY need the ak74u and einfield for any situation, knifing is more broken than the mp40 being a 2 hit kill weapon on console without stopping power, the maps are somewhat nice but too small and spawning is broken(on every map not just nuketown), attachments are completely fucked, helicopters avoid locked on rockets far too fucking often(given the 5 fucking second reload time) and speaking of helicopters the killstreaks are op.

Even crysis with the cheapest tank being most overpowered was more balanced than black ops.

The only thing I like about black ops is zombies and the only thing going for the game is for a casual console fps it’s definitely not the worse.

Read full topic

item.title: Call of Duty: Black Ops
item.dc:creator: @Cbot Cbot
item.description:
@Cbot wrote:

Although a lot of people rip on COD for being extended way past its prime, I believe treyarch is in the right track with this.

However, the best, if not, only way to properly play any COD game is on the xbox. If there is something the COD series needs to do right is to actually develop side by side on consoles/PC, instead of port their games. But at least treyarch is TRYING to fix the PC/PS3 versions (even though they claim them not to be ports, when they clearly are).

Game wise I can confidently say this is the most balanced COD game I’ve played so far. Other than certain killstreaks (RC-XD, Napalm, Chopper) nothing is heavily OP as some other things in other COD games. Although there are things overused, it doesn’t make them overpowered.

Read full topic

item.description:

The difference between Treyarch and Infinity Ward is that Treyarch don’t spend much time on the game before the launch but work on the bugs and glitches after the launch while IW spend days and nights on the game before the launch but are to lazy to fix bugs and glitches after.
